CustomField.description: Where Quote line is NOT Optional, Unit Cost * Quantity. Where Sub Rental * Term.
CustomField.formula: IF( SBQQ__Optional__c = TRUE, 0, SBQQ__UnitCost__c * SBQQ__Quantity__c * Sublease_Multiplier__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Where Quote line is NOT Optional, Unit Cost * Quantity. Where Sub Rental * Term.
CustomField.label: Total Cost excl Optional
